title: IAA Tonight | WNBA Star Brittney Griner Sentenced to 9 years in Russian Prison
description: Brittney Griner was found guilty in Russian court and sentenced to nine years in prison for drug possession and drug smuggling with criminal intent. Auntie Chantel Tremitiere, Leger Douzable, and Omar Kelly react to the news of Griner's sentence. Plus, we continue our NFL season preview and head down to the ATL. How will the Falcons look without Matt Ryan at the the helm?
author: smanderville@houseofathlete.com (Auntie Chantel Tremitiere, Leger Douzable, Omar Kelly)
